mapper.select: SELECT d.dict_type_id, COALESCE(l.field_value, d.dict_label) as 'dictLabel', d.dict_value, d.attr_type FROM sys_dict_data d LEFT JOIN sys_language l ON l.table_name = 'sys_dict_data' and l.field_name = 'label' and d.id = l.table_id AND l.`language` = #{language} ORDER BY d.dict_type_id, d.sort
